title: Authorize password recovery
name: AuthorizeResetPassword
description: This will actually perform the password recovery.

Parameter.description: The id of the user. this is hidden. The user do not need to enter this.
The token generated to recover the password. this is hidden. The user do not need to enter this.

Success 200.description: A success message "Your password has been changed successfuly"

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: Check Session
name: CheckSession
description: This will return true if a user is logged in and false otherwise

title: Create User
name: CreateUser
description: This will create a user, delete the user from the tobeApproved model and add the user to Intern or Company model depending on the role of the user.

title: Forgot Password
name: ForgotPassword
description: On a valid request, a recovery link will be send to the user's email.

Success 200.description: A success message "password recovery link has been send to user"

examples.title: Success-Response:

title: analize a request to forget password.
name: ForgotPassword
description: On a valid request, a recovery link will be send to the user's email.

Success 200.description: A success message "password recovery link has been send to user"

examples.title: Success-Response:
Success-Response:
examples.content:
{
    "success": true,
    "message": 'Auth Successfu',
     "token": token,
     "user": {
            "_id": "5db44378dabe471c620daeb7",
            "role": "Intern",
            "name": "Yocabed",
            "email": "yo@mel",
            "interests": ["Law","Economics"]
            "field": "Law",
            "discription": "I am GC class...",
            "__v": 0
    }
}

title: Render password recovery form
name: RecoveryForm
description: This can only be accessed in the users email. The password recovery link is going to go to this route and render a form for the user to enter the new password.

Parameter.description: The token generated to recover the password.

Success 200.description: The company to the user apply to.

examples.title: Success-Response (The updated company):
examples.content:
{"success": true,
    "company": {
        "_id": "5db44378dabe471c620daeb7",
    "name": "Qene",
    "email": "qene@gm",

    "role": "Company",

                       "email":"bini@gnail.com",
                       "field": "Electrical and Computer Engineering",
                        "experiance": ""}],
    "appliedInterns": [],
    "__v": 0
    }
  }

the list of interns who applied to the internship the company posted
The ID of the Company to be deleted.

title: Create Intrnship
name: CreateInternship
description: This will create a new internship and it will also add the internship to the myinternships array in the company's profile. Intended to use by the companies.

Parameter.description: the type of Intern needed for the internship.
the langitude and longutiude location of the internship place.

examples.title: Request-Example:
examples.content:
{
            "name": "Tikur Anbesa",
            "email": "tikuranbesa@gmail.com",
            "website": "www.tikuranbesa.org",
            "title": "Tikur Anbesa Hospital Summer program",
            "responsibility": "Full hour",
            "working_hour": "8 hours per day",
            "wage": "4000 birr/month",
            "city": "Addis Ababa",
            "catagory": "Health",
   }

title: Delete Internship
name: DeleteInternship
description: This will delete the internship and also delete the internship from myinternship array of the Company

Parameter.description: The ID of the Internship to be deleted.

Success 200.description: A message confirming success of intern deletion

title: Filter Internship
name: FilterInternship
description: This will filter the internship by the intern's interest

title: Delete TobeApproved
name: DeleteTobeApproved
description: This is to delete the tobeApproved user

Parameter.description: The ID of the TobeApproved to be deleted.

Success 200.description: A message confirming success of tobeApproved deletion

title: Get all tobeApproved
name: GetAllTobeApproved
description: This will get the tobeapproved by id

title: Get TobeApproved
name: GetTobeApproved
description: This will get the tobeApproved by id.

title: Update TobeApproved
name: UpdateTobeApproved
description: This is to update the information in the tobeApproved model

Parameter.description: The ID of the tobeApproved to be updated.
